comment: Good teacher. 3 tests, 3 event forms, 1 presentation, 1 in-class assignment, and sign a course waiver which was an EASY 100! Everything was easy especially the presentation, that was not that bad, but his test was not that easy which shock me. But he gave like 10-15 point curve on every test except the final. Easy class!

He is a great professor! He is super clear and very understanding. The only time I went to class was to turn in the three event forms, test review and test days and ended up with an A. TAKE THIS CLASS.

Easiest class ever. I only attend class on the review day before the quiz and on quiz day and I have a high A! The first week when I did attend, he lectures all class period. He is a great professor, but his lectures are very boring. I def recommend taking him though!

Great teacher! Easiest A, ever. 3 quizzes. I got a 105 on the first and a 98 on the 2nd so far. He curves all the tests 10-15 points each. Ppts all online and he's really nice. People who complain about his class obviously don't try to put any effort into his class. One day he got people to sign a piece of paper of who was there for extra credit
Good teacher, but the most boring class ever. He literally lectures the entire 75 minutes. He loves to hear himself talk. Tough quizzes, usually about 40 questions. I'd try to find someone else.
Great helpful teacher, only required three thing outside of class. Didn't need my book all that much but his power points were a lot of help enjoyed his class most of the time.

He is such a sweet and nice person, and also pretty cute and quirky. He absolutely loves art history and is very articulate in his lectures. Very concise, and he'll help you 101% if you ask him about anything- takes the time to actually ask if you have an questions and is eager to help. He does take attendance, highly recommended professor!

Professor Ciejka is a really nice person. He's genuinely interested in his subject and his students. As long as you go to class and take notes, you should get an A. There's not many reviews because he's new, but don't let that turn you away- he's a great professor!
Great guy... made class fun. I was so not wanting to take this class but I give it a 10 outta 10 because of the professor

Such a sweet teacher. He'll try to help you in any way possible. Attendance is mandatory but we just take notes from powerpoints. Tests are easy if you study or even just pay attention in class. Extra credit and corrections on every test. Would definitely take him again.
Lectures in every class, but its just a review of whats in the book.  Very easy, very easy to understand, will answer any question asked, very nice
